Key:
Ah. Maybe I ate too much. Rinne's food is just
so delicious that I can't help overeating.
Hm? Yes...?
Shido, are you here?
Yeah, but... what's up?
I was going to take a bath, but we're out of shampoo.
Oh, we were running low, weren't we?

So you already noticed and didn't do anything
about it? Ugh.
S-Sorry, I just forgot.

Sorry won't fix it. Go to the store and get some right
now if you're really sorry. You wouldn't dare say
no, would you?
Okay, okay. I'll go buy it.
You better hurry or I'll... I'll do something!
I get it! Just hold on.
Hmph...
Ugh. Kotori's so bossy...
Hm?
Oh, hi, Shido-san. Good evening.
O-Oh. What are you doing out this late?
Sometimes, the night is just more convenient...
Uh... what are you doing?
Hehe. That's a secret.
I see. I guess I won't ask anymore then.

Oh? You're not curious? I mean...
what if I happen to be eating people?
You aren't though... are you?
Eh? Why would you assume that?

Well, you said you didn't plan on it.
At least for right now, anyway.
Heh. Yes, I mentioned something like that.

I will leave it to your imagination to guess what
I was doing. Now then... good night, Shido-san.
She's always saying the most suggestive things.
I better let Kotori know that I saw Kurumi lurking around.
I'll tell Kotori as soon as I get home.
I'm home. I bought the shampoo, Kotori!

Did everyone fall asleep? Well, whatever.
I'll take a bath while I still can.

Now that we have more people living with us,
we're always fighting for the bathroom. I gotta
take advantage of this while I can.
Oh? Someone left the light on?
What?
Shi...do?
K-Kotori...? What are you...?
What? Why are you in a daze?
Oh. Uh... u-uh... I just bought some shampoo...
You idiot! You idiot brother!
S-Sorry! It wasn't on purpose!
You ready?
W-Wait. Can we talk about...
Ugh. You're hopeless.

I-I said I'm sorry. We used to bathe together
back in the day. What's the big deal?
Did you say something?

Nothing, nothing at all!
I want to tell you something.
Are you trying to change the subject?
No, when I went to get shampoo, I saw Kurumi.

What?! You saw Kurumi?!
Are you okay? Did she do something?
No, we just talked a little.

I see. Kurumi is dangerous. Be careful out
there. Ugh, another problem to deal with...
Sorry...

If you're able to seal her, I'd say this
might be a good opportunity for us...
Considering last time... I'm sure it's easier said...
Good point. Oh well.

So what about things on your end?
Were you able to find anything out?

Nothing. We had observed the Spirits' reaction
throughout Tengu City, but... that's all we know.
Is there no way to look into it further?

We could've if it was possible, but we can't
get a hold of headquarters so there's nothing
we can really do.

We're in the middle of a big phenomenon though.
And I think Tengu City is in the center of this big
change. That's all I can say for sure.
I see.
Don't give me that look.
But...

Shido, your job is to go on dates with Spirits and
stabilize them. If a girl dates a guy with the face
you're wearing, they'll only feel worse.
Sorry. I looked that glum, huh?

Yeah, and it worries me. Shido, you need
to act normal or the Spirits won't feel at ease.
Okay...
Alright, I'll be borrowing your kitchen then.
Yeah, sorry for the trouble all the time.

Hee hee, you promised not to say that, right?
Next door neighbors help each other out, after all.

Of course. If there's ever anything I can help with
at your house Rinne, you can always ask me.
Thanks, Shido. But I don't think there's anything right now?
It's true, you do have it together, Rinne...
...Is that so? I hope so...
Hm? What's wrong?
It's nothing. Alright then, I'll prepare things quickly.
Alright, I'll be watching the pot on my end. I'll leave that side to you.
Okay. Leave it to me.
Today's meal is meat and potato stew.
Ohhh! This is quite the delicious smell!
Everyone's here, right? Then, let's eat!
Yes!  Let us eat!
Yeah! Time to eat!
L...Let's eat!
It's fluffy and delicious, Shido...!
You're right, this is definitely a motherly flavor.
Motherly flavor?
Umm...I guess you could say it means, a nostalgic sort of taste?
That's right. I wonder why, the taste is reassuring.

Hmm. I see...
Then I must aim for a motherly taste when I cook!
Huh? You, cooking...?

Yes! I can do something like cooking too, Shido.
I make such things like cookies occasionally too...
Oh, that's right. Sorry.
Oh, Tohka-chan, would you like seconds?
Yes Rinne, please!

Hee hee, you're welcome.
Don't rush too much and spill it.
Yes! Leave it to me!
Good grief...
